input.sentences: it was his first time trying this dish .
the menu had plenty of tasty items listed .
i pulled my hair back before getting into the water .
output.sentences: Tim was eating dinner at his favourite pizza place trying to decide where to go on his next holiday
Staring at the menu it hit him, Tim would hop a plane to Hawaii!
Once he arrived he went straight to the beach where he ran into a tourist called sophie
They hit it off straight away, and decided they'd head back to his hotel for a drink
As they walked together along the beach toward the hotel, Tim thanked god that his menu didn't inspire a different trip
